channel.title: Apprentices on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in Apprentices on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: RRC NCR Prayagraj Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), North Central Railway, Prayagraj has invited online applications for 1763 Act Apprentice vacancies under the Apprentices Act 1961. Eligible 10th + ITI pass candidates can apply from 18th September to 17th October 2025 at rrcpryj.org.

item.title: IOCL NR Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited (IOCL), Marketing Division – Northern Region, has announced 523 Apprentice vacancies for 2025. The application window is open from 12 September to 11 October 2025. Eligible candidates with ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply online. Selection will be based on merit, document verification, and medical examination, with no application fee for any category.

item.title: LIC Housing Finance Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: LIC Housing Finance Limited (LIC HFL) has announced 192 Apprentice vacancies for graduates under a 12-month apprenticeship program. Candidates aged 20–25 years can apply online from 02/09/2025 to 22/09/2025. Selection will be through an online exam, document verification, and interview.

item.title: ECIL ITI Trade Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: ECIL ITI Trade Apprentice Recruitment 2025: Electronics Corporation of India Limited (ECIL), Hyderabad has announced 412 Apprentice vacancies in various ITI trades. Eligible candidates from all over India, including females, can apply online from 01/09/2025 to 22/09/2025. Selection will be based on ITI merit and document verification, and training will begin on 01/11/2025 at ECIL Hyderabad, Telangana.

item.title: Naval Dockyard Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Naval Dockyard, Mumbai has released a notification for 286 Apprentice vacancies in various ITI and Non-ITI trades under the Apprentices Act 1961. Both male and female candidates from all states can apply online between 25th August 2025 and 12th September 2025 at https://applicationportal.in/ No application fee is required.

item.title: RRC WCR Apprentice Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), West Central Railway has announced 2,865 Apprentice vacancies under Notification No. 01/2025. The online application process will run from 30th August to 29th September 2025. Candidates must have passed 10th Class with at least 50% marks along with an ITI certificate (NCVT/SCVT) in the relevant trade. The age limit is 15 to 24 years with relaxation as per rules. Selection will be purely based on merit (10th + ITI marks). Application fee is ₹141 for UR/OBC/EWS and ₹41 for SC/ST/PwBD/Women. Interested candidates can apply online through the official website wcr.indianrailways.gov.in.

item.title: RCFL Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Limited (RCFL) has announced 325 Apprentice vacancies for Graduate, Technician, and Trade categories. Eligible candidates with Graduation, Diploma, or 12th qualification can apply online till 12th September 2025. Selection will be done on a merit basis (marks in qualifying exam), with no written test.

item.title: Indian Oil IOCL Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: IOCL has invited online applications for 537 Apprentice vacancies in its Pipelines Division under Advertisement No. PL/HR/ESTB/APPR (2025)-2. The application window is open from 29th August 2025 to 18th September 2025. Candidates with 12th Pass, ITI, Diploma, or Graduation qualifications can apply for various posts such as Technician Apprentice, Trade Apprentice (HR/Accountant), and Data Entry Operator. The selection will be purely merit-based on educational marks, followed by document verification and medical examination. There is no application fee for this recruitment.

item.title: RRC SR Apprentices Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell, Southern Railway (RRC SR) has released the official notification for Apprentice Recruitment 2025, offering a total of 3518 apprenticeship slots across various workshops and divisions including Perambur, Golden Rock, Podanur, Chennai, Salem, Madurai, Palakkad, and Trivandrum. Eligible candidates who have passed 10th (50% marks), 12th with Science (for MLT trades), or ITI in relevant trades can apply online from 25 August 2025 to 25 September 2025. The selection will be based on a merit list prepared from academic and ITI marks. Apprentices will receive a stipend of ₹6,000–₹7,000 per month during training. This engagement is purely for apprenticeship training under the Apprentices Act, 1961, and does not guarantee direct employment, though preference will be given in future railway recruitments to candidates who complete the training successfully.

item.title: IOB Indian Overseas Bank Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Overseas Bank has announced the Apprentice Recruitment 2025 for 750 vacancies across various states and UTs. Applications will be accepted online from 10 August to 20 August 2025 through the BFSI SSC portal, with the online exam tentatively scheduled for 24 August 2025. Graduates aged 20–28 years are eligible, with relaxations as per government norms. Selection will be based on an online test, local language proficiency, and document verification. Stipend ranges from ₹10,000 to ₹15,000 depending on posting location.

item.title: RRC Central Railway Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRC Central Railway is inviting online applications for 2,418 Apprentice posts under various trades in Mumbai, Bhusawal, Pune, Nagpur, and Solapur divisions. Eligible candidates must have passed 10th with at least 50% marks and possess an ITI certificate in the relevant trade. The application window is open from 12 August to 11 September 2025. Selection will be based on merit from Class 10 and ITI marks. A stipend of ₹7,000 per month will be provided during the 1-year training. Apply only through the official website rrccr.com.

item.title: RRC Eastern Railway Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), Eastern Railway, Kolkata has released the official notification for Apprentice Recruitment 2025 for a total of 3115 trade-wise vacancies. The recruitment is open for various divisions and workshops including Howrah, Sealdah, Asansol, Malda, Liluah, Jamalpur, and Kanchrapara. Candidates who have passed Class 10th and possess an ITI certificate in the relevant trade are eligible to apply. The age of the applicant should be between 15 and 24 years. The selection will be based purely on merit, considering the marks obtained in 10th and ITI – no written exam will be conducted. Applications must be submitted online through the official RRC ER website within the prescribed dates.

item.title: Indian Navy Skilled Tradesman & Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Navy is inviting applications for 1266 Tradesman Skilled Apprentice posts under the 2025 recruitment drive, including backlog vacancies. The online application process will run from 13 August 2025 to 02 September 2025. Both male and female candidates who meet the eligibility criteria can apply through the official website.

item.title: IOCL Southern Region SR Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: IOCL Southern Region has announced 475 Apprentice vacancies for Trade, Technician, and Graduate disciplines across Tamil Nadu & Puducherry, Karnataka, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, and Telangana. The application process will be open from 08 August 2025 to 05 September 2025 through the NAPS/NATS portal. Candidates will be selected based on merit, with no written exam or interview.

item.title: Indian Bank Apprentice Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Bank has invited online applications for the engagement of 1500 Apprentices under the Apprentices Act, 1961 for the financial year 2025–26. Candidates who hold a graduate degree in any discipline and have passed on or after 01 April 2021 are eligible to apply. The age of applicants must be between 20 to 28 years as on 01 July 2025, with relaxation applicable for reserved categories. The application process is online, and the registration window is open from 18 July 2025 to 07 August 2025. Selected candidates will undergo one year of apprenticeship training at various Indian Bank branches across the country. The selection will be based on a written examination followed by local language proficiency verification.

item.title: Railway SWR Apprentices Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Railway Recruitment Cell (RRC), South Western Railway (SWR), Hubballi has invited online applications for 904 Apprentice posts in various trades across its divisions — Hubballi, Bengaluru, Mysuru, and Central Workshop Mysuru. Candidates who have passed 10th class with 50% marks and hold a valid ITI certificate in the relevant trade can apply.

item.title: ICF Apprentice Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Integral Coach Factory (ICF), Indian Railways has released a notification for the recruitment of Apprentices for the year 2025. A total of approximately 1010 vacancies are available across various trades like Fitter, Electrician, Welder, Painter, Carpenter, Machinist, and MLT. The recruitment is open for both Fresher and Ex-ITI candidates. Applicants must have passed Class 10th or 12th, and ITI is required for certain trades. The selection will be based on merit, without any written exam.

item.title: Railway BLW Apprentices Vacancy 2025 Online Form
item.description: Banaras Locomotive Works (BLW), Indian Railways, has released the official notification for the 47th Batch Act Apprentice Recruitment 2025. A total of 374 apprentice posts are available for both ITI and Non-ITI candidates. The trades include Fitter (137 posts), Carpenter (3), Painter (General) (7), Machinist (82), Welder (G&E) (56), and Electrician (89). For ITI posts, candidates must have passed Class 10th with at least 50% marks and hold an ITI certificate in the relevant trade from NCVT/SCVT. For Non-ITI posts, only 10th pass with 50% marks is required. The application process is completely online through the official website blw.indianrailways.gov.in. Interested candidates must apply before the last date as mentioned in the notification.
